alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 5:40AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Pasco and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 615 AM EST... At 540 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pebble Creek to near University. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Zephyrhills, Hillsborough River State Park, Pebble Creek, University, Zephyrhills South, Busch Gardens, Thonotosassa, New Tampa, Meadow Pointe, University Of South Florida, Lettuce Lake Park, Crystal Springs and Wesley Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco
